description.narrative: The Feasibility Study aims to build more vibrant tourism and furniture industries in Liberia; improve the export competitiveness of Liberian products, through drafting two development proposals for these industries, as well as drafting a legal and institutional framework for Tourism and Furniture Authorities/Boards; draft an image rebranding strategic and commercialization roadmap; identify structural adjustments to the value chains; and prepare a comprehensive set of strategic plans of actions for the sectors

The feasibility study will provide for the following key deliverables: (1) conducting a country study on the tourism sector in Liberia; (2) conducting a country study on the furniture sector in Liberia; (3) identifying the key challenges and value chain linkages issues; (4) identifying potential projects to be submitted to donors; and (5) drafting the feasibility studies reports.

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
